description: This file defines a React functional component called FiltersSidebar, which provides UI controls for filtering items based on age, sex, color, and maximum price. It manages internal state for filter values and calls an onChange callback whenever filters are updated or reset.

methods.name: FiltersSidebar({ onChange })
methods.description: React functional component displaying filter controls, managing filter state, and invoking onChange callback with updated filters.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Helper function to update individual filter values in state and trigger onChange callback.
